content:
/>
IX.ii.2.B.4.c
.
Considering Supplementation of Farm Income Prior to Disablement
Consider whether the Veteran supplemented farm income by working as a hired laborer for others before becoming disabled and whether, because of physical impairment, this source of income is no longer available.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Disability, Unemployability, and Marginal Employment for Pension
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
